channel.title: Evan Doorbell's Phone Tapes (Production Tapes)
channel.description: Evan Doorbell's Phone Tapes are a well known "documentary" of how the phone system used to be like in the 1970s. Evan has recorded many hours of "phone tapes" of the old phone network.
